Variable Documentation

int init_test

Sets the debugging message level for various INI files. Ranges from 0-8, with zero being the lowest level.

const char* txt_names[txt_all]
Initial value:
 {
    "NormalTxt", "ExtraTxt", "WNormalTxt",
    "WExtraTxt", "WDoors"
}
int txtoffsets[desc_number]

Stores an integer array of texture offsets for the Descent and Descent 2 PIG files?

Each index in the array corresponds to a Descent version. The order is as follows:

  • Descent 1 Shareware 1.0
  • Descent 1 Registered 1.0
  • Descent 1 Registered 1.4
  • Descent 2 Shareware 1.0
